meanings.definition: The state of being widely known or recognized.
meanings.sent1: Her famousness grew after she starred in the hit movie.
meanings.sent2: His famousness as a singer attracted many fans to his concert.
meanings.sent3: The famousness of the cat who could dance brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The famousness of the mountain peak could be seen from miles away.
meanings.sent5: The town celebrated the famousness of its oldest resident with a parade.

meanings.definition: The quality of being well-known or celebrated.
meanings.sent1: The famousness of the painting was evident in the crowded museum.
meanings.sent2: She achieved great famousness for her charitable work.
meanings.sent3: The famousness of the talking parrot amused the children at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The famousness of the old clock tower echoed through the town.
meanings.sent5: The famousness of the author's books made them bestsellers worldwide.

meanings.definition: The condition of being famous or renowned.
meanings.sent1: His famousness in the sports world made him a role model for many young athletes.
meanings.sent2: The famousness of the historical figure was celebrated in museums and books.
meanings.sent3: The famousness of the clown's act brought laughter to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The famousness of the ancient ruins captured the imagination of archaeologists.
meanings.sent5: The famousness of the scientist's discovery revolutionized the field of chemistry.
